The ice rain is coming to the Pskov region.Yesterday 18:00.0
Synoptics reported that, in the morning and afternoon of 12 February, from the south, ice rain, hololyde, on the roads of hololyde is expected in Pskov province.

The warning of a dangerous weather event came to the residents of Pskov province.

Frauders, under the image of cell company staff, have fraudulently accessed the personal offices of a number of users of the Gosu Services site. This has been reported to the Regional Office of Internal Affairs Press Service.

The Greaterdomin Artem Barinov was elected President of the Youth Parliament10 February 16:000
On 9 February, a new President of the Youth Parliament of the Pskov Regional Assembly of Deputies was elected. They became the head of the Youth Policy DivisionArtem Barin♪

The globelenian received 17 of the 26 votes of parliamentarians.
The two pedestrians who have been killed will be tried by an old magnificent.10 February 14:000
On 19 June 2023, due to the dangerous situation on the road, a 61-year-old giant left on the sidewalk where two pedestrians were hit. One of them suffered injuries that caused serious harmhealth
The stadium is being refurbished in the Greater Town Region10 February 12:000
In the Great Town, the school stadium will be repaired soon.

" The technical fitness of the preschool stadium is not in conformity with the legal requirements. Since the development of sport and physical culture in the Laczew school has been given special attention, the need for the stadium has been enormous. "Alexei Kuzmin Circ

On 9 February, at 23:15, there was a report of fire in the bathhouse on Parhomenko Street.

On 10 February, in 04:04, fire and rescue units received a fire signal in the bathhouse on the streetBotanic specimen

info.title: The Greaterdomin Artem Barinov was elected President of the Youth Parliament
info.short_text:
On 9 February, a new President of the Youth Parliament of the Pskov Regional Assembly of Deputies was elected. They became the chief expert of the Artem Barin Youth Policy Division.

The globelenian received 17 of the 26 votes of parliamentarians.

info.title: The stadium is being refurbished in the Greater Town Region
info.short_text:
In the Great Town, the school stadium will be repaired soon.

" The technical fitness of the preschool stadium is not in conformity with the legal requirements. Since the development of sport and physical culture in the Laczew school has been given special attention, the need for the stadium is huge, " noted by Alexei Kuzmin, the head of the Great Cities District,
